subject: Commission Payment Schedule Inquiry
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

Happy New Year to you and your team! ?
I hope you’ve had a great start to the year.

I’m writing to kindly ask about the commission payment schedule for the
current payout period. I have generated valid affiliate commissions and
would appreciate it if you could let me know when this batch is expected to
be processed.

Thank you very much for your support. I look forward to continuing our
cooperation in the new year.

Best regards,
Hieu
